title: hontakAri nInEve
sahitya:
hontakArinInEvE ento hanumantarAya


anupallavi

  shAnta ati balavanta antavidUra shAnta dAnta surakAnta hanta 
vEdAnta daitya hanta vAda duranta nuta niyanta yuktivanta


caraNam 1    sAgaravanu balu vEgadindali dATi bEga lankege pOgi Aga banda daityara nIgADi sangaravAgi 
ungurava sItAnganege kapi pungavEndra nIDi sankaDavOgADi nagaravu nODi suTTu bUdimADda
    caraNam 2    tAmarasa bandhu nEma vashshavAridhi sOmanAda shrI sItArAma pAda pankajadhAma sOmajarAma
kOmalAnga varanAma bhUma guNadhAma nara mrgEndra jaladhicandra suguNasAndra suravarEndra
    caraNam 3    vIrara gelidati sura urusanhita dhIra jagannAtha purandara viTTalana puravara uradalidda dhIra 
karuNAkara ghOra daitya nivAra suravara cAru nEDida vIra duritavAra sharaNasura vIrAdhi vIra
